tool_description: Leverage LDE's Entity Resolution API to expertly match data, find social profiles, discovery relationships in data, and fix inconsistent data.
name: Entity Resolution API
title: Entity Resolution API

api_list.name: getPing
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://entity-resolution-api.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entity-resolution-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://entity-resolution-api.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entity-resolution-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
